call-timeout.help: FortiClient EMS call timeout in seconds (1 - 180 seconds, default = 30).
call-timeout.name: call-timeout

options.help: Allow this FortiGate unit to load the authentication page provided by EMS to authenticate itself with EMS.
options.name: fabric-auth

options.help: Allow silent approval of non-root or FortiGate HA clusters on EMS in the Security Fabric.
options.name: silent-approval

options.help: Enable/disable websockets for this FortiGate unit. Override behavior using websocket-override.
options.name: websocket

options.help: Allow this FortiGate unit to request malware hash notifications over websocket.
options.name: websocket-malware

options.help: Enable/disable syncing deep inspection certificates with EMS.
options.name: push-ca-certs

options.help: Can recieve tag information from New Common Tags API from EMS.
options.name: common-tags-api

options.help: Allow this FortiGate to retrieve Tenant-ID from EMS.
options.name: tenant-id

options.help: Production FortiClient EMS Cloud Controller.
options.name: production

options.help: Alpha FortiClient EMS Cloud Controller.
options.name: alpha

options.help: Beta FortiClient EMS Cloud Controller.
options.name: beta

options.help: FortiClient EMS entry not dirty.
options.name: none

options.help: FortiClient EMS entry dirty because EMS SN is mismatched with configured SN.
options.name: mismatched-ems-sn

fortinetone-cloud-authentication.help: Enable/disable authentication of FortiClient EMS Cloud through FortiCloud account.
fortinetone-cloud-authentication.name: fortinetone-cloud-authentication

options.help: Enable authentication of FortiClient EMS Cloud through the use of FortiCloud account.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable authentication of FortiClient EMS Cloud through the use of FortiCloud account.
options.name: disable

https-port.help: FortiClient EMS HTTPS access port number. (1 - 65535, default: 443).
https-port.name: https-port

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface automatically.
options.name: auto

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

options.help: Set outgoing interface manually.
options.name: specify

out-of-sync-threshold.help: Outdated resource threshold in seconds (10 - 3600, default = 180).
out-of-sync-threshold.name: out-of-sync-threshold

preserve-ssl-session.help: Enable/disable preservation of EMS SSL session connection. Warning, most users should not touch this setting.
preserve-ssl-session.name: preserve-ssl-session

options.help: Allow preservation of EMS SSL session connection.
options.name: enable

options.help: Don't allow preservation of EMS SSL session connection.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable pulling FortiClient user avatars from EMS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable pulling FortiClient user avatars from EMS.
options.name: disable

pull-malware-hash.help: Enable/disable pulling FortiClient malware hash from EMS.
pull-malware-hash.name: pull-malware-hash

options.help: Enable pulling FortiClient malware hash from EMS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable pulling FortiClient malware hash from EMS.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable pulling FortiClient user SysInfo from EMS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable pulling FortiClient user SysInfo from EMS.
options.name: disable

pull-tags.help: Enable/disable pulling FortiClient user tags from EMS.
pull-tags.name: pull-tags

options.help: Enable pulling FortiClient user tags from EMS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable pulling FortiClient user tags from EMS.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable pulling client vulnerabilities from EMS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable pulling client vulnerabilities from EMS.
options.name: disable

server.help: FortiClient EMS FQDN or IPv4 address.
server.name: server

status.help: Enable or disable this EMS configuration.
status.name: status

options.help: Enable EMS configuration and operation.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable EMS configuration and operation.
options.name: disable

trust-ca-cn.help: Enable/disable trust of the EMS certificate issuer(CA) and common name(CN) for certificate auto-renewal.
trust-ca-cn.name: trust-ca-cn

options.help: Trust EMS certificate CA & CN to automatically renew certificate.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not trust EMS certificate CA & CN to automatically renew certificate.
options.name: disable

websocket-override.help: Enable/disable override behavior for how this FortiGate unit connects to EMS using a WebSocket connection.
websocket-override.name: websocket-override

options.help: Do not override the WebSocket connection. Connect to WebSocket of this EMS server if it is capable (default).
options.name: disable

options.help: Override the WebSocket connection. Do not connect to WebSocket even if EMS is capable of a WebSocket connection.
options.name: enable

results.help: Configure FortiClient Enterprise Management Server (EMS) entries.
results.name: fctems
